content: p5 ssk k1 k2tog p4 k2 p4 yo k1 yo p5 k2 row 23 p2 k5 p3 k4 p2 k4 p3 k5 p2 row 24 k2 p5 sk2p p2 p2tog k1 m1 k1 p4 k1 yo twice k1 p5 k2 copyright 2011 saranac hale spencer and the defarge knittery all rights reserved for pattern support contact tricoteuse@defargeknittery com terms defined p2tog purl two stitches together increase 1 knit into the front and the back of the same stitch yo yarn over wrap the yarn over the right- hand needle increase 1 ps purl into the front and the back of the same stitch ssk slip slip knit slip each of the next two stitches knitwise onto the right-hand needle move them in their new positions back to the left- hand needle and knit them together k2tog knit two stitches together m1 to make a new stitch pick up the yarn running between two stitches with the left-hand needle point and knit into the back of it sk2p slip the first stitch knit the next two stitches together pass the slipped stitch over the k2tog you have decreased two stitches copyright 2011 saranac hale spencer and the defarge knittery all rights reserved for pattern support contact tricoteuse@defargeknittery com
